modShortDescription: Find or purchase 36 new animals to start your own business breeding and raising. Each animal type has it's own growth and mating rates.
modDescription:
Find or purchase 36 new animals to start your own business breeding and raising. Each animal type has itâ€™s own growth and mating rates.

A new baby will grow into a young animal, which will then grow into an adult. Once an adult, the [animals](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/) can be butchered to get resources, or kept alive to reproduce, allowing you to continue the cycle.

Single player only! Alpha 19.5 b60.

## Changelog

Fixed error when using with the [Horses 2.0](https://7daystodiemods.com/telrics-horses-2-0/) mod.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/hmuh4xzi4u3zdzv/TelricsHusbandryA19.zip?dl=1)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19976-telrics-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Telric](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/telric/)
